biography:
Ralf Alastair John Little is an English actor and writer working mainly in television comedy.

While studying medicine at the University of Manchester's School of Medicine he was offered a role in the BBC sitcom "The Royle Family".  He abandoned his studies and focused on his acting career

He has played Antony Royle in the BBC's "The Royle Family" and Jonny Keogh in the BBC's  "Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps".
name: Ralf Little
